Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS XT Chemistry Products TRIG-CHOL Slides
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS XT Chemistry Products TRIG-CHOL Slides for quantitative measurement of triglycerides and cholesterol in serum and plasma using colorimetric technology on VITROS XT 7600 Integrated System
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of triglyceride and cholesterol concentrations in serum and plasma for diagnosis and treatment of lipid metabolism disorders, diabetes mellitus, nephrosis, liver and renal diseases, and atherosclerosis
